subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Mike Mottau’s first goal since October tied the score late in the third period, and Zach Parise scored the only goal in a shootout Friday to give the Devils a 2-1 victory over the visiting Buffalo Sabres.
snippet: Defenseman Mike Mottau’s first goal since October tied the score late in the third period, and Zach Parise scored the only goal in a shootout Friday to give the Devils a 2-1 victory over the visiting Buffalo Sabres.
